snippet.title: Mafia 2 (2008) Christmas Trailer in 4K Resolution (Extended)
snippet.description:
Mafia 2 - Official Game Trailer from 2008. Mafia II: Holiday Confession Trailer is the second & third trailer for Mafia II by Illusion Softworks (now known as 2K Czech). The second trailer was this video but only first 60 seconds. This is the 90 Second Extended Trailer. Mafia 2 Christmas trailer debuted on Spike TV's blog on the Spike Video Game awards on Sunday, December 14, 2008. This gameplay trailer consists of Beta content and has been upscaled to 4K 60fps. For more Mafia 2 remastered trailers, cut content and easter eggs visit here: https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLcxsOVkYfi4B7Vy1bFT-QWudCz5OEqjv2

● Mafia 2 (2007) First Trailer: https://youtu.be/1bZvVJmUBxU
● Mafia 2 Kick in the Head: https://youtu.be/k3bynrqzLzM
● Mafia 2 Rare Commercial: https://youtu.be/QkeeZpxYdgk
● Mafia 2 Beta - Betting Dog races: https://youtu.be/Ar-I-Nq2IFs




ABOUT THIS CHANNEL

This channel is in no way associated with 2K Games or Hangar 13 Games.
Mafia Game Videos is a fan channel dedicated to bringing you the latest news, guides and videos from the Mafia video game series.

#Mafia #Mafia2 #MafiaTrilogy
